Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
Action The base class of all other action classes.
Assignment2 A demostration instance of assignment 2.
CreateGiftAction Create a gift by collecting user input attributes.
CreateItemAction Create an item by collecting user input attributes.
Customer Customer class stores the information of a customer and provides methods to manipulate them.
GenerateCustomerListAction Print out all customers' status inside the store
GenerateGiftListAction Print out a list of all status of all gifts inside the store.
GenerateItemListAction Generate a list of all item status inside the store
GenerateStoreReportAction Print out a store report including all status of items, gift and customers and sale and redeem values in the store.
Gift A gift class contains information of it and provides methods to manipulate them.
IOUtility IOUtility is a class to help and pack output and input operation
Item Item class contains name, description, sale count, price and its availability and provides methods to manipulate them.
MainMenu The main menu of the store terminal This menu including following menu options:
Search elements in the store
Add a new item to store
Add a new gift to store
Sale item to customer
Redeem gift to customer
List all customers in store
List all items in store
List all gifts in store
Print out a store report including previous three
Quit the store terminal
Menu Root class of all other menu classes
Model Abstract class Model - the root of all other store components.
ModelStackArray<T> A last in first out array container for model and derived classes.
This container can only handle a class derived from class Model
NOTE:This class requires the latest version of java runtime support.
RedeemGiftAction Redeem gifts to a customer by searching both name of them in the store.
SaleItemAction Sale item to customer by name action by searching both name of them in the store.
SearchCustomerByNameAction This action provides search customer service by collect its unique item name.
THIS ACTION IS NOT CASE SENSITIVE!
SearchGiftByNameAction Search a gift by its unique name action
THIS ACTION IS NOT CASE SENSITIVE!
SearchGiftsByPointsValueAction List items under given maximum points value
SearchItemByNameAction Search an item by its unique name action
THIS ACTION IS NOT CASE SENSITIVE!
SearchItemsByPriceAction List items between a chosen price scope
SearchMenu Search menu of the store terminal.
This menu including following menu options:
Search item by name
Search items by price
Search gift by name
Search gifts by points value
Search customer by name
Store Class Store will maintain Customer, Item and Gift and handle all sale and redeem functions.
Terminal The Terminal class provides a text user interface menu for store operation.
 

Enum Summary
Customer.Group The customer group
